title: Stage Lv10-S30
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Everything has completely changed now. It's a new beginning.
The turning point has finally come. From now on, it's for real.
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 이제 완전히 바뀐 거야. 새로운 시작이야.
sentences.en: Everything has completely changed now. It's a new beginning.
The turning point has finally come. From now on, it's for real.
The situation has changed 180 degrees. It's a completely different game.

sentences.kr: 이 순간이 분기점이야. 여기서 갈라지는 거야.
sentences.en: This moment is the crossroads. This is where paths diverge.
This is truly a historic moment. I should remember this.
We've entered a completely new phase.
The past is the past now. Let's only look forward.
What a dramatic change. Who could have predicted it?
